String.LicenseL00DescText2: <LicenseInfoListEntrydesc_Cyan>Select a drift type from the menu</><LicenseInfoListEntrydesc_White> to practice.</>

String.Licenselicense_mission_beginner_004DescT: <LicenseInfoListEntrydesc_White>Use the </><LicenseInfoListEntrydesc_Cyan>Water Wisp </><LicenseInfoListEntrydesc_White>when the </><LicenseInfoListEntrydesc_Cyan>blue dummy is just ahead of you.</>
String.Licenselicense_mission_beginner_001DescT: <LicenseInfoListEntrydesc_White>Hit </><LicenseInfoListEntrydesc_Cyan>as many dummies as you can </><LicenseInfoListEntrydesc_White>with your </><LicenseInfoListEntrydesc_Cyan>Water Bombs.</>

String.Licenselicense_mission_beginner_003DescT: <LicenseInfoListEntrydesc_Cyan>Lightning attacks everyone. </><LicenseInfoListEntrydesc_White>It can be blocked with </><LicenseInfoListEntrydesc_Cyan>Angel Armor.</>
String.Licenselicense_mission_rookie_005DescTex: <LicenseInfoListEntrydesc_White>Use a </><LicenseInfoListEntrydesc_Cyan>Boost to jump as far as you can.</>
String.Licenselicense_mission_rookie_001DescTex: <LicenseInfoListEntrydesc_White>You have </><LicenseInfoListEntrydesc_Cyan>5 Shields </><LicenseInfoListEntrydesc_White>that you can use to break through the Barricades.</>

String.PlayMission_Guide_Script_1: Hey, <Scenario_Desc_Bold>{0}</>, it's been a while! Getting the hang of racing?
String.Match_tutorial_Script_11:
Choosing <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>AI</> will pit you against the AI only.
Choosing <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>Racers</> will place you against racers instead.
String.Tutorial_Ingame_Mission1_Script30: Why don't you give it a shot? Press <Key AxisOrActionName="MoveForward" AxisValue="1.0"/> right when it says <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>GO</>.
String.Tutorial_Ingame_Mission1_Script31_M: Tap Start right when it says <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>GO</>.
String.Tutorial_Ingame_Mission4_Script80: Did I forget to teach you about <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>drifting</>?
String.Tutorial_Ingame_Mission4_Script120: <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>Drifting</> is a great way to handle <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>sharp turns and curves</> in the track.
String.Tutorial_Ingame_Mission4_Script130: By <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>drifting</>, you can keep your momentum coming out of the turn.
String.Tutorial_Ingame_Mission4_Fail1: Hold <Key AxisOrActionName="MoveForward" AxisValue="1.0"/> while maintaining your speed to <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>drift</>!
String.Tutorial_Ingame_Mission4_Fail2: Hold down <Key AxisOrActionName="MoveRight" AxisValue="1.0"/> and <Key AxisOrActionName="Drift"/> to <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>drift</>!
String.Tutorial_Ingame_Mission4_Script140: Hold down <Key AxisOrActionName="Drift"/> while pressing <Key AxisOrActionName="MoveRight" AxisValue="-1.0"/> or <Key AxisOrActionName="MoveRight" AxisValue="1.0"/> to execute a <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>sharp turn</>!
String.Tutorial_Ingame_Mission4_Script61: Once the <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>Boost Gauge </>is full, you'll get a free <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>Boost</>!
String.Tutorial_Ingame_Mission4_Script202: Once the <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>Boost Gauge </>is full, you'll get a free <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>Boost </>.
String.Tutorial_Ingame_Mission4_Script60: You can fill the <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>Boost Gauge</> by <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>drifting</>.
String.Tutorial_Ingame_Mission4_Script330: Just like in Item Mode, you can press <Key AxisOrActionName="UseItem"/> to activate the <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>Boost</> item.
String.Tutorial_Ingame_Mission3_Fail1: Keep holding <Key AxisOrActionName="MoveForward" AxisValue="1.0"/> to get the full <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>boost</>!
String.Tutorial_Ingame_Mission3_Script90: To get ready for your <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>Boost</>, first get up to speed by holding <Key AxisOrActionName="MoveForward" AxisValue="1.0"/>!
String.Tutorial_Ingame_Mission4_Script210: To get an <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>Instant Boost</>, press <Key AxisOrActionName="MoveForward" AxisValue="1.0"/> after straightening out of a drift.
String.Tutorial_Ingame_Mission4_Script50: In <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>Speed Mode</>, you'll get a <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>Boost Gauge</> under your item slots.
String.Tutorial_Ingame_Mission3_Cut1_Script20: Drive through a <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>box</> to get a <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>random</> item!
String.Tutorial_Ingame_Mission3_Script20: Look at your <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>item slots!</> You picked up a Boost item!
String.Match_tutorial_Script_3: Besides <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>Item Mode</>, you can also play <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>Speed Mode, Grand Prix, Solo Mode,</> and lots more!
String.Tutorial_Ingame_Mission3_Cut1_Script10: If you're in an <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>Item Mode</> race, you'll see boxes all over the track.
String.Tutorial_Ingame_Mission2_Cut2_Script21: No need to worry. A guideline will always show when you're playing in <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>Auto</>!
String.Tutorial_Ingame_Mission2_Cut2_Script21_1: No need to worry. A guideline will always show when you're playing in <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>Automatic</>!
String.Tutorial_Ingame_Mission1_Script10: Using a <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>Start Boost </>gives you a burst of speed at the start of a race.
String.Tutorial_Ingame_Mission1_Fail1: Keeping holding <Key AxisOrActionName="MoveForward" AxisValue="1.0"/> to maintain your <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>Start Boost</>!

String.TuningStage_Desc32:
<UpgradeInfoBalloon_Normal>Move forward without turning during a drift</>
<UpgradeInfoBalloon_Normal>to automatically enter a Long Slide Drift.</>
String.TuningStage_Desc25:
<UpgradeInfoBalloon_Normal>Lowers the drift control difficulty</>
<UpgradeInfoBalloon_Normal>and increases the acceleration during a Long Slide Drift.</>
String.TuningStage_Desc29: <UpgradeInfoBalloon_Normal>Preserves a percentage of your Boost Gauge when colliding with a wall during a drift.</>
String.TuningStage_Desc28:
<UpgradeInfoBalloon_Normal>Increases the Long Slide Drift's sustainability and speed,</>
<UpgradeInfoBalloon_Normal> but also makes it more difficult to control.</>
String.TuningStage_Desc27: <UpgradeInfoBalloon_Normal>Increases amount of charge for the Boost Gauge.</>
String.TuningStage_Desc24:
<UpgradeInfoBalloon_Normal>Increases Speed Mode Boost acceleration.</>
<UpgradeInfoBalloon_Info>Does not apply to Item Mode Boost.</>
String.TuningStage_Desc26:
<UpgradeInfoBalloon_Normal>Increases Speed Mode Boost duration.</>
<UpgradeInfoBalloon_Info>Does not apply to Item Mode Boost.</>

String.Option_display3_Static82:
Disable
Disables NVIDIA Reflex.

Reflex
Reduces system latency (keyboard input lag).

Reflex + Boost
Enables the Reflex and Boost features.

String.Option_rookie6_Static96_1:
[<image id="beginnercare"/>Automatic]
Provides a streamlined experience for new racers, but limits certain controls over your drift.
- Enables all Driving Assistance features.
- Displays <image id="beginnercare"/> to the right of your racer name.

[Original]
Puts you in complete manual control of your kart but limits certain Driving Assistance features.
- Pick and choose the Driving Assistance features that you want.
- Edge Guardrails and Corner Guardrails cannot be used in Original.
String.Option_control5_Static31:
[<image id="r2"/> Accelerate]
- This is the default control scheme for KartRider: Drift.
- Accelerate with <image id="r2"/> and reverse with <image id="l2"/>.

[<image id="o"/> Accelerate]
- This is a control scheme seen in other racing games.
- Accelerate with <image id="o"/> and reverse with <image id="x"/>.

Customize your controls as you see fit.
Controls will revert to default upon reset.
String.Option_control5_Static28:
[<image id="rt"/> Accelerate]
- This is the default control scheme for KartRider: Drift.
- Accelerate with <image id="rt"/> and reverse with <image id="lt"/>.

[<image id="b"/> Accelerate]
- This is a control scheme seen in other racing games.
- Accelerate with <image id="b"/> and reverse with <image id="a"/>.

Customize your controls as you see fit.
Controls will revert to default upon reset.

- Accelerate, reverse, and steer using the arrow keys.

String.TrackDesc_Village_R03: One of Boomhill's trickiest tracks. Dao used to practice his racing here. The curves and alley shortcuts gave him a lot of trouble, but laid the foundation for the racer he is today.

This kart illuminates even the darkest of nights,
bathing the world in soft, golden rays of light.

String.Item_Motion:351010006_DESC: Thank you very much! It was a team effort!
String.Item_Motion:351020006_DESC: Thank you very much! It was a team effort!

String.TrackDesc_WKC_R05: This track demands a tough decision from the racer: do you travel through a winding and treacherous set of turns or take your kart through a slow and decelerating grassy straightaway? An intense longing for first place may occur as you race through the festivities, but remember the famous saying: "Getting the gold sometimes requires big sacrifices."
String.Item_Motion:325010003_DESC: Were you trying to catch me off guard?
String.Item_Motion:325020003_DESC: Were you trying to catch me off guard?
String.Item_Motion:337010001_DESC: I will not stand for this!
String.Item_Costume:210000003_DESC:
Her eyes on the winner's podium, Marid swaps her driving gloves out for a tennis racket.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Game, set, match! I win again! Don't you just love this game?"</>
String.TrackDesc_World_I08: Race through the roads and alleys of the district of Gangnam. Take in the big business buildings and feats of architecture as you zip through these iconic streets.
String.ShopItem-Pack_Resistance_Neo_PromotionDe: Take on the race with nerves of steel!
String.Item_Kart:401000224_DESC: With an indomitable will stronger than steel, this kart never bends unless it chooses to.
String.Item_Costume:219000007_DESC:
Tobi is finding it tough to be intimidating when his looks are just so cute.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Tremble in fear, human! ...Hey! Stop pinching my cheeks!"</>

This racing gear is slick, streamlined, and most important of all: frog-themed!
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Ribbit!"</>

String.Item_Kart:401000040_DESC: No one knows the ins and outs of the city streets like a taxi driver.
String.Item_Kart:401000163_DESC: Flatten anything that gets in your way!
String.TrackDesc_World_R02: Speed downhill under the watchful eye of a titanic Bazzi statue, then paraglide through the sky on this thrilling track.
String.TrackDesc_Desert_I02: This track winds its way inside a massive pyramid. Lodumani will sometimes come here to look for treasure, but he always returns empty-handed.
String.Item_Costume:201000010_DESC:
Don't look in the mirror, Dao!
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Aaaaaah! A monster!!"</>
String.Item_Character:100000029_DESC:
A surfer who never gives in, even when the waves are rough! Like the ocean, Martin has a flowing personality that changes depending on the weather. He's popular with the ladies, but has had a crush on his friend Rena since childhood.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Nothing is as awesome as watching a sunset from the top of a gnarly wave!"</>
String.ShopItem-LiveryFirstPack2_PromotionDesc: Complete your style with the unstoppable Storm!

<Dialog_ItemBold>"Do you hear that? It reminds me of something familiar..."</>

String.TrackDesc_Desert_I03: In a distant past, these streets were bustling with life. It's a simple track as long as you don't get distracted by the beautiful scenery. But where did all the people go?
String.Item_Costume:213000001_DESC:

<Dialog_ItemBold>"Follow me. I'll get you to safety."</>
String.Item_Costume:220000003_DESC:
Mobi's part-time job at the fruit store has the seeds of something great.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Well, I can still do this if the pirate thing doesn't work out."</>

Tiera used magic and science to become queen!
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Sometimes science is just as powerful as magic!"</>

<Dialog_ItemBold>"Should we limit scientific progress simply for the sake of ethical concerns? Absolutely not!"</>

Airi only races wearing a special suit that is on the cutting edge of technology.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Top speed isn't fast enough! How about light speed?!"</>

<Dialog_ItemBold>"All this technical stuff is booooriiing..."</>

String.Item_Character:100000006_DESC:
Tiera is a witch with powers matched only by her warm heart. She's fallen under the spell of racing and now prefers a kart to her broom.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Nothing is as exciting as magic!"</>
String.Timeattack_SaveLocation_Toast_Desc2: The current record could not be registered while using the Rewind feature.
String.Option_control5_SaveLocation_Desc3:
Pressing this button while rewinding will change the speed.
Each press will change the rewind speed in the following order:

- x2 -> Skip -> x1 -> x1.5 -> ... (repeat)
The default setting is x1.5

String.Item_Character:100000027_DESC:
Spirit Kid is a shy but playful ghost who loves to surprise others while keeping her face concealed. She seems to resemble Draky's little sister but has no memory of her past life.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Who am I? I haven't a clue!"</>
String.ShopItem-Pack_Emoticon_Draki_detailDesc: Emoji: Draky Confident, Emoji: Draky Mocking, Emoji: Draky Furious, Emoji: Draky Disappointed, Emoji: Draky Cheers, Emoji: Draky Approves, Emoji: Draky Disapproves, Emoji: Draky Wait, Emoji: Draky Uninterested
String.TrackDesc_Tomb_I06: Draky sacrificed his own mortality to create the Altar of Life that is the heart of this track. Nearby is a framed portrait of his sister, well-maintained and clean even after all these years, as if someone continues to lovingly dust it.
String.GameGuide_InfinityBooster_PlayGuide_Desc: Even hitting a wall during a drift <GuideInfoListEntrydesc_Cyan>will not</> reduce your boost gauge!
String.License_Loading_Tip1: Turning in the opposite direction of your drift is called counter-steering.
String.License_Loading_Tip8: Turning in the opposite direction of your drift is called counter-steering.
String.License.LicenseMissionId301.licenseStart: Drift to turn corners smoothly and cross the finish line.
String.Option_rookie6_Static27:
Corrects the maximum drift angle to prevent oversteering when the Drift button is held for a long time. Oversteering correction is strong at max stage, with decreasing effects at medium and min stages.

While enabled, a Driving Assistance Balloon will be attached to your kart.

Max: Available for B2 racers or lower.

Medium: Available for B1 racers or lower.

Min: Available for L3 racers or lower.
String.License.LicenseMissionId301.licenseFailT: Timing is key when you're straightening out after a drift.

String.Skill_P08_Desc_Long_RaptorL_1: Raptor L has modified his steering wheel in honor of his own name! Whenever you tap the left key, a portion of his skill gauge fills up. Driving faster will fill the gauge faster, and when it is full, he obtains a Barricade.
String.SeasonEvent05_4_PopUpMessage1: Equip the Raptor R Balloon and take on the Happy New Year Event challenge!
String.Skill_P09_Desc_Long_RaptorR_1: Raptor R has modified his steering wheel in honor of his own name! Whenever you tap the right key, a portion of his skill gauge will fill up. Driving faster will fill the gauge faster, and when it is full, he obtains a Barricade.

String.Item_Character:100000039_DESC:
Orion is a running back who wants to bring his talent to racing. He would rather tackle obstacles head on instead of trying to avoid them.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"On the field or on the track, I can't be beat!"</>
String.Pack_LovelyCutie_Viktor_detailDesc: Character: Cutie Viktor, Kart: Slash Tuner, Accessory: Slash Tuner License Plate

String.Item_Costume:210000002_DESC:
Marid exudes a posh cuteness.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"I know, I'm fabulous."</>
String.TrackDesc_World_I02: This tour of London centers on the observation deck that brightens the night sky. Be sure to enjoy the attractions, like Brodi posing as a royal guard! It almost makes you want to go off-track for some sightseeing.

String.ShopItem-KDIBryanPack_PromotionDesc: Launch Celebration Part 2! Special Agent Brian busts crime!
String.ShopItem-NewyorkRexPack_PromotionDesc: Launch Celebration Part 3! Rex will take care of New York!
String.ShopItem-NewyorkChrisPack_PromotionDesc: Launch Celebration Part 4! Stylish Kris in New York City!

String.Skill_P15_Desc_Long_Rave_1: The undying love of Rave's fans protects her everywhere she goes! When she is hit by an item that slides her, such as a Banana, Rave activates a shield that blocks those attacks a certain amount of times.

<Dialog_ItemBold>"You can follow your dreams after I'm done winning first place!"</>

<Dialog_ItemBold>"What can I say about myself that the tabloids haven't already?"</>

<Dialog_ItemBold>"G-go t-t-t-team! Y-y-you can d-d-do it!!"</>
String.Item_Costume:202000012_DESC:
Racing is fun, but Bazzi isn't afraid to drive off the course and enjoy the view.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"What's the point of life if you don't kick up your feet and enjoy?"</>
<Dialog_ItemBoldYellow>- Exclusive to Android devices.</>
String.Lootbox_Desc_6: View and open your Racing Boxes.
String.Item_Costume:202000001_DESC:
Bazzi moves slow and drives fast. He has a knack for finding trouble, but he always finds his way out of it through sheer luck.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Can this day get any worse? ...Oh, I found a sandwich!"</>
String.Item_Motion:340020009_DESC: You're pretty good, you know that?

String.Item_Costume:201000008_DESC:
Dao has gone green.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Eco-friendly kart coming through!"</>
String.Item_Kart:401000009_DESC: A pig who really digs into racing. Covering the track with mud and good times. Oink!
String.Tutorial_Intro_Script50: It's also where you learn your first racing skill. Aren't you curious?
String.Item_Costume:226000002_DESC:
Draky maintains his dignity even when flying into first place.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"It's nothing, really. All you need to do is hone a winning attitude for centuries."</>
String.Item_Kart:401000166_DESC: This cart really went off the rails. In its new life as a kart, it relishes in the freedom and speed of the course!
String.Item_Costume:243000003_DESC:
Miso wreaks havoc on the track with the Legend Cup's energy and futuristic technology.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Pass me if you can!"</>
String.Item_Costume:211000001_DESC:
This infamous pirate of the seven seas gets his kicks by running other karts off the road. His garage is filled with karts and doubloons.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Avast! The first-place treasure be mine!"</>
String.Skill_P07_Desc_Long_Rex_1: Rex is out to get revenge on everyone who labeled him a traitor! Whenever Rex is hit by a Missile and successfully activates the Instant Boost, he has a chance to activate a Siren with a long duration.
String.Loginevent_main_Static4: Grab your login reward and have a nice day!

String.KOAccount_GUSS_28: Access from this computer has been blocked. Please contact Nexon customer support.
String.Item_Character:100000020_DESC:
When he was younger, Mobi admired Lodumani and eventually worked his way into becoming his first mate. Now he considers the South Boom Sea to be his territory, keeping out anyone who ventures too close.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"I put the 'Boom' in the South Boom Sea!"</>
String.Item_Character:100000028_DESC:
The violent and somewhat clumsy Toto is second-in-command of Lodumani's pirate crew. He's jealous of Mobi ever since he took over the first mate position, but always rushes to his side when he's in danger.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Ready for a real taste of Lodumani's pirate crew?"</>
String.Skill_A08_Desc_Long_Lodumani_1: Lodumani swings his skull cane and plunders the racetrack! When this skill is activated, Lodumani will loot all nearby Item Boxes, keeping whatever he can in his empty item slots.
String.Option_sound4_Static12: Lobby: Voice chat with party members
String.Community_nexon1_Static20: You can go to the Lobby and accept or reject party join requests.
String.Option_display3_Static50: Sets the maximum FPS in the Lobby. Lowering the FPS is recommended if you have a low-performance device. This value cannot be adjusted on some devices.

String.Skill_A16_Desc_Long_Lucid_1: Lucid summons a horde of nightmarish butterflies! When this skill is active, butterflies temporarily increase Lucid's speed and explode any racers that crash into her, inflicting explosion damage.
String.Item_Costume:239000002_DESC:
Despite it being his first appearance in the League, Orion isn't anxious at all.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Only the people who haven't been practicing are the ones who get nervous."</>
String.Item_Character:100000025_DESC:
Derek is a legendary racer with the world record for most wins. He wears his helmet to cover a scar responsible for rumors about his past.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"I'd rather break than bend."</>

String.Item_Costume:217000001_DESC:
This lively girl from Brazil is an excellent engineer. She's on a mission to redeem her friend, Kris.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"There's still good in Kris. I know there is!"</>
String.Item_Costume:201000012_DESC:
Dao gives a villainous chuckle as he waxes his R-Man mustache.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"The old Dao is done for, you hear? Done for! Mwahaha!"</>
String.Item_Kart:401000253_DESC:
A kart personally designed for R-Man.
All fueled up and ready to sabotage the race!

String.Item_Motion:345010004_DESC: Yes! The love is spreading like wildfire!
String.Item_Motion:345020004_DESC: Yes! The love is spreading like wildfire!
String.Item_Kart:401000251_DESC:
Who rides brooms anymore?!
This kart cleans up on the racetrack!
String.Skill_P02_Desc_Long_Marid_1: Marid is buying her way into first place! Marid joins the race with Boost and obtains more Boosts after a certain amount of time. The cooldown reduces as the gap between her and the 1st place increases.
String.Item_Kart:401000053_DESC:
Behold, the magical drift!
Turn racing into an art form with this kart!
String.Item_Motion:306010002_DESC: It's always magical when I'm the winner!
String.Item_Motion:306020002_DESC: It's always magical when I'm the winner!
String.Item_Costume:206000001_DESC:
Tiera is a witch from the fairytale land of Prettion. She seems shy at first, but get her talking about magic and she'll never stop!
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Is there anything magic can't do?"</>
String.ShopItem-Pack_MagicPumpkin_detailDesc: Kart: Hallowheels, Accessory: Hallowheels License Plate
String.Item_Motion:306010006_DESC: There's something magical about being the best!.
String.Item_Kart:401000004_DESC: This enchanted pumpkin had to muscle past all manner of monster and ghost to reach the starting line.

String.Item_Motion:351010007_DESC: Maybe a churro will cheer me up...

JISOO has the experience and positive attitude to take the lead of any race.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Come on, everyone! All eyes on me!"</>

A customer left some food on their plate, and now Keffy faces a terrible dilemma...
<Dialog_ItemBold>"I shouldn't... But I could! ...but I shouldn't..."</>

Brodi travels back and forth to the land of the living to transport the dead.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Come on in! There's no charge for this ride!"</>

ROS demonstrates her talent for singing and for driving.

String.Match_tutorial_Script_17:
You can select the <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>difficulty of the track</>.
And if there is a track you don't want to play, you can always <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>exclude</> it.
String.Match_tutorial_Script_14:
You can select the <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>difficulty of the track</>. And if there is a track you don't want to play, you can always
<Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>exclude</> it. Let's go with <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>Track Difficulty 1</> to get started!
String.Option_main2_Static35:
Controls how hard match making tries to put you in a game with high-latency racers. Your gameplay experience may be smoother with better latency, but it may also take more time to find a race.

"Balanced" is recommended to ensure a happy medium between matching speed and smooth gameplay.

Sometimes when you enter a race, I may make an appearance and present you with a test.
If you manage to complete it before the race ends you pass!

Don't let the extra toppings fool you!
This kart is hungry to win another race!

String.ShopItem-PinkBeanPack_DetailDesc: Character: MapleStory Pink Bean, Emote: 12 Fine Pink Bean Emotes, Emote: 2 Rare Pink Bean Emotes, Emblem: Pink Bean Emblem
String.Item_Character:100000005_DESC:
In MapleStory, Lucid is the master of dreams. Now that she's in KartRider: Drift, she dreams of becoming the master of the track.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"I'll see you... in your dreams!"</>
String.Item_Character:100000004_DESC:
Adorable. Fun-loving. Fiercely powerful. When Pink Bean isn't busy fighting the heroes of Maple World, he likes to fill his days zipping around in his kart.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"I'm Pink Bean!"</>
String.Item_Kart:413000012_DESC:
A terrifying marriage of shark and metal.
This kart is pure destruction on the race track!
String.Grandprix_Popup_HOF_Text1: Congratulations on entering the Hall of Fame!
String.Grandprix_Crossplay_No_HOF_2: Cross-Platform Play must be enabled if you want to enter the Hall of Fame.

String.Item_Costume:243000001_DESC:
A young woman who lost her memories. Brodi found her in the forest and took her in to work in his factory.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"My memories... I lost them... in the Legend Cup?"</>

Derek joined up with Rabbit Hole for mysterious reasons he'd rather not share.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Can't blame me for doing what I had to!"</>

Select the Party Finder settings.

String.Growth_Static12: You can get rewards every time you reach a target level.

String.Item_Kart:401000007_DESC: The roar of this truck's monstrous engine resounds for miles around.
String.Item_Kart:401000113_DESC:
Monster meets shark.
Shake up the tracks with a mighty roar.
String.Item_Kart:401000143_DESC:
A raging dust storm appears!
Here comes the last true outlaw of the west.
String.Item_Kart:401000005_DESC: A deep gloom follows this haunted kart all over the track.
String.ShopItem-Pack_GhostPumpkin_PromotionDesc: Spookily speed around in a kart that came straight from the graveyard!
String.Item_Motion:357020010_DESC: I feel free when I'm on stage!
String.Item_Character:100000058_DESC:
ROS of BLACKPINK is a global superstar who loves singing to her fans. She's going beyond the stage to highlight her skills in KartRider: Drift.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"I'm getting pretty good at this!"</>
String.Item_Character:100000057_DESC:
LISA of BLACKPINK is a global superstar who loves singing to her fans. She's going beyond the stage to show off her style in KartRider: Drift.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"How do you think I did, BLINK?"</>
String.Item_Character:100000055_DESC:
JENNIE of BLACKPINK is a global superstar who loves singing to her fans. She's going beyond the stage to present another side to her personality in KartRider: Drift.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"I was scared at first, but this is really fun!"</>
String.Item_Character:100000056_DESC:
JISOO of BLACKPINK is a global superstar who loves singing to her fans. She's going beyond the stage to bring harmony everyone in KartRider: Drift.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"We can all win if we do it together!"</>
String.ShopItem-Pack_SummerSense_detailDesc: Decal: Mood Beach, Decal: Hibiscus, Decal: Blue Gecko
String.TrackDesc_Moonhill_I03: Vandals have made a mess of this track, cluttering the tunnel with boxes taken from a suspiciously wrecked truck. If you're cautious, you can avoid them and win the race!
String.Item_Costume:255000001_DESC:
Although she can seem shy at first, JENNIE is sure to rock any track.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"I'm destined for the crown!"</>

Bazzi only goes for three pointers.

In his own eyes, Rex is Moonhill City's ultimate racer. In the eyes of the citizens, he is its greatest villain.

String.SeasonEvent05_1_D1: Enjoy a moonlit race in Moonhill!
String.TrackDesc_Moonhill_R05: This track takes you through Moonhill City Central Station, a glitzy city street, and the industrial city. Take in the glamorous night life and the seedy underbelly all in one go!
String.TrackDesc_Moonhill_I04: Race side-by-side with Moonhill City's iconic streetcars. It may sound fun to play chicken down the rails, but take care not to get squished!
String.Item_Character:100000038_DESC:
Underneath the mayor of Moonhill's pleasant appearance is a supervillain unlike any other! He turns the very best racers into his own personal R-Men.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"I am but a humble servant to the people of Moonhill City. Yes... a servant..."</>
String.Other_Deco_Moonhill_detailDesc: Decal: Moonhill Mayor, Decal: Nighttime Train, Decal: Moonlight Vigilante
String.TrackDesc_World_I09: This track lets you experience all that Venice, the City of Water, has to offer! True to its name, you'll find gondoliers paddling their boats in the canals, while on land, the narrow streets often lead to collisions! If you don't want one of your own, or to take an impromptu dive in the water, be sure to watch your speed!
String.Skill_P04_Desc_Long_Rena_1: Rena can't stand the thought of getting wet! When Rena is trapped in a water effect, she makes a set amount of quick escapes.
String.Skill_P03_Desc_Long_Martin_1: Martin loves any opportunity to get wet! With a set probability, Martin may obtain either a Water Bomb or Water Wisp, depending on which one he blocked or was hit by.
String.License.LicenseMissionId203.licenseFailT: Don't forget to use your Water Wisp and Water Bomb.
Practice using Water Wisps and Water Bombs.
String.License.LicenseMissionId203.licenseStart: Turn the tables by attacking competing racers with Water Wisps and Water Bombs.
String.skill_popup_desc_pram6: Rate of Water Bomb x5 appearing: {0}%
String.license_Result_Mission1_Tip:
When using the Water Bomb, there is a short delay before it explodes.
Master this timing to get an edge on your opponents.
String.Option_rookie6_Static109: Displays the location of the Water Bomb's explosion on the Mini Map before using it.
String.Item_Motion:345020008_DESC: Is there anything fun to do around here?
String.ShopItem-Pack_Hippopotamus_PromotionDesc: A hippo slipping and sliding into first place!
String.Item_Kart:401000264_DESC:
A sports car with futuristic technology applied.
It uses processed Hexnium as its power source to approach the speed of light.
String.Item_Kart:401000010_DESC: A kart so advanced, so high tech, so cutting edge, you'll swear it's from the future.
String.Item_Kart:401000079_DESC: Futuristic power turning and a peerless presence shake up the track.
String.License.LicenseMissionId206.licenseFailT: Mind your direction before you accelerate.
Mind your direction before you accelerate.

Please enter your year and month of birth (6 digits) for age verification.
String.Shop_popup9_Static5:
Guardian (parental) consent is required for a minor to purchase {ItemName}.
Did you receive a guardian's consent to purchase {ItemName}?

String.NMEvent_Popup_D2:
Complete challenges and collect {0} to unlock the next reward!
(Remaining Points to Next Reward: {1})
String.Lobby_modeselect1_Desc3: Get rewards for clearing challenges! You can get additional rewards based on the number of stars you earn.
String.Lobby_modeselect1_Desbloquea_License1: Get rewards for clearing challenges! You can get additional rewards based on the number of stars you earn. <ModeDesc_BoldRed>Not available while in a party.</>
String.SeasonEvent_D1: Clear missions and obtain trophies to progress your racing pass!
String.Challenge_popup_Mission3: Claim your rewards in your mailbox.
String.Skill_A05_Desc_Long_Miso_1: Miso is proud to show off the power of the Legends Cup combined with futuristic technology! When this skill is activated, Miso will pull a selected racer from the opposing team towards her. If the racer is on her team, nothing happens.
String.ShopItem-Pack_Summering_Miso_PromotionDe: Build sand castles again and again with Miso.
String.Item_Costume:203000004_DESC:
Brodi is ready to go pro.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Go long!"</>
String.Item_Costume:239000001_DESC:
Orion dominates the racetrack like it was his own personal football field.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Get out of my way or I'll tackle you!"</>
String.Item_Costume:239000003_DESC:
Not only is Orion is famous on the football field, he knows his way around the library as well.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"I've got the books and the brains to make it on the racetrack."</>
String.Item_Costume:203000008_DESC:
Brodi runs his pit crew like a well-oiled machine.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"You, check the tires. You, fill 'er up. And you! Drive fast."</>
String.PlayMission_HUD_Mission_Type14: Finish a race and drive over {0} or fewer Bananas
String.PlayMission_HUD_Mission_Type15: Finish a race without driving over any Bananas
String.ShopItem-Pack_SummerVacation_Banana_deta: Decal: Banana's Summer Vacation 1, Decal: Banana's Summer Vacation 2, Decal: Banana's Summer Vacation 3
String.Item_Costume:201000007_DESC:
Dao has everything he needs to swim in the ocean.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Watch out, fish! You're about to make a new best friend!"</>
String.TrackDesc_Flag_F01: Make a getaway to first place on this island surrounded by the beautiful sea! Without any obstacles, this track makes for an equal playing field, so you'll need to be at your best to outrace your opponents and sprint across the finish line!
String.Item_Kart:401000015_DESC:
Avast ye matey!
This be the terror of the high seas and the track!
String.Item_Kart:401000141_DESC: The land and the sea are no match for this amphibious kart. Now you can go wherever the race takes you!
String.TrackDesc_World_I06: Oceans and planes, together at last! There are shortcuts to be had here, but take care not to get stuck in a propeller.
String.License.LicenseMissionId209.licenseFailT: Use an Instant Boost right as the kart lands.
Use an Instant Boost right as the kart lands.
String.License.LicenseMissionId209.licenseStart: Use an Instant Boost right as the kart lands.
String.Inventory_kart1_Impossible2: This kart can't equip kart bodies.
String.Item_Kart:401000223_DESC: This ship cuts through the wildest waves. Now it makes a splash on the track with some new wheels.
String.Item_Kart:401000232_DESC: Swift like a blade, this kart cuts through the air! The sharp lines and fine contours are like a work of art.
String.Pack_Barista_Miso_detailDesc: Balloon: Barista Miso, Balloon: Coffee Balloon
String.license_Result_Mission6_Tip:
Drive between the Barricades.
Try using a Shield if you can't avoid them.
String.Loading_Tip_common_169: You can not equip wheels on karts that were designed without them.
String.Item_EmotionSpecial_Zipi_detailDesc: Emote: Applaud (Mayor Zipi), Emote: Dance (Mayor Zipi)
String.ShopItem-Pack_EmotionSpecial_Tiera_detai: Emote: Applaud (Tiera), Emote: Dance (Tiera), Emblem: Tiera Emblem
String.SeasonEvent05_3_D1: Welcome to 2024! Race with KartRider: Drift in the New Year!
String.Item_Costume:248000003_DESC:
COOKY loves running marathons in the mountains for fun.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Where does my strength come from? Well, these eyebrows are pretty strong!"</>
String.Item_Motion:355010005_DESC: BLINK sure knows how to show their love!
String.Item_Motion:355020005_DESC: BLINK sure knows how to show their love!
String.Item_Motion:349010005_DESC: It's not so bad being attacked by my heart, is it?
String.Item_Motion:349020005_DESC: It's not so bad being attacked by my heart, is it?

String.Item_Costume:203000005_DESC:
Brodi teaches the most popular class on kart repair.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Polish. Tighten. Grease! Faster!"</>
String.Shop_popup7_Static6: Please review any notes on used coupons.
String.Item_Costume:223000001_DESC:
This detective from the UK will go to any length to crack the case. He's a nice guy, but he can get a little fixated on the job...
<Dialog_ItemBold>"I'd hate to see something happen to that fancy kart of yours..."</>
String.Item_Kart:401000045_DESC: An eagle flying through the night. It protects the city submerged in darkness.
String.Tutorial_Ingame_Mission4_Script201: Did you see the <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>Boost Gauge </>fill up from that drift?
String.Item_Motion:322020008_DESC: I just ate. Why am I hungry again?
String.Tutorial_Ingame_Mission4_Script280: As you just learned, steer to the right when you enter the corner,
String.Tutorial_Ingame_Mission2_Cut1_Script10: Why don't you drive to that <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>shiny area</> using what I've just taught you?
String.Tutorial_Ingame_Mission3_Script60: A <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>Boost</> gives you a short burst of speed when you use it.
String.License.LicenseMissionId208.licenseStart: Use defense items to block attacks and reach the finish line within the time limit.
String.Tobyrush_Gameinfo:
Drive aggressively but be sure to keep your wits about you!
Try out this frenetic race where the last 8 racers each lap are disqualified.
String.License.LicenseMissionId208.licenseFailT: Use Shields, EMP Waves, and Angel Armor when you need to defend yourself.
Use Shields, EMP Waves, and Angel Armor when you need to defend yourself.
String.Communication_quick_chat60: Who wants to be the host?
String.Custom_menuselect1_Desc1: Host your own race and select whichever modes and tracks you prefer.
String.Option_control5_Static12:
Hold while turning to drift.
You will continue to drift as long as this is held down.
String.License.LicenseMissionId101.licenseStart: Use the arrow keys to accelerate, brake, reverse, and turn.
String.Tutorial_Ingame_Mission2_Script30: You steer with <Key AxisOrActionName="MoveRight" AxisValue="-1.0"/> and <Key AxisOrActionName="MoveRight" AxisValue="1.0"/>. Simple, right?
String.Tutorial_Ingame_Mission2_Script31_M: Touch the left and right controls to steer.

String.Option_sound4_Static3: Adjusts the volume of background music, sound effects, character voices, and so on.
String.Option_display3_Static63: Affects background density, character quality, and effect quality. Higher values may impact performance. At very high, you may experience dropped frames, heating, and increased battery drain. The range for this setting may be limited depending on your device.
String.Skill_A06_Desc_Long_Bazzi_1: Bazzi can pull some amazing things out of his bag! When this skill is activated, Bazzi rolls a Water Balloon in front of him that immobilizes any racers caught in the blast, trapping them in water.
String.GameGuide_FlagMode_PlayGuide_Desc4: Using the available items will help you secure a victory!
String.Item_Costume:226000001_DESC:
After countless years honing his occult skills, Draky has finally made a breakthrough. 
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Now, I shall be able to save her from the icy grip of death!"</>
String.EC_NxPatcher_80113: The operation was canceled because background updates are disabled.
String.Loading_Tip_common_15: Got racers on your tail? Check your rearview mirror!
String.ShopItem-Pack_WhiteSnake_detailDesc: Kart: White Fang, Accessory: White Fang License Plate
String.ShopItem-Pack_Vampire_Neo_detailDesc: Character: Vampire Neo, Kart: Vampire, Accessory: Vampire License Plate
String.Item_Costume:213000008_DESC:
Neo is still getting used to his new strict diet.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"It's not right to hurt someone just because I'm a little bit hungry...right?"</>
String.TrackDesc_Forest_I03: A track through a deep valley west of Bubble Hill. This desolate setting is perfect for a race of pure skill. The road is rough, though, so it'll be a bumpy ride!
String.Item_Kart:401000099_DESC:
The monster awakens and explodes
with wild power.
String.Tutorial_Ingame_Mission4_Script31: We're already at the last step: <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>drifting</>.
String.Item_Kart:401000180_DESC:
Unleash inescapable speed! This muscle kart dominates the track.
<Dialog_ItemBoldYellow>- Exclusive to Steam. Appears differently on other platforms.</>
String.Item_Character:100000003_DESC:
Brodi is cloaked in mystery. Few know what brilliant kart designs this enigmatic foreman has under his hard hat.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Check it out! The perfect kart!"</>
String.license_Result_Mission4_Title: Line Them Up and Knock Them Down

Don't get slowed down as much after hitting a wall. Collision force is strongly reduced at max stage, with decreasing effects at medium and min stages.

This prevents shortcuts from being used.
While enabled, a Driving Assistance Balloon will be attached to your kart.

Max: Available for B2 racers or lower.
Medium: Available for B1 racers or lower.
Min: Available for L3 racers or lower.

Even when he's treasure hunting, Brian can't get away from his law enforcement roots.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"I'm taking this gold into evidence."</>

String.TrackDesc_Mine_I01: Glittering gemstones line the walls of this mine tunnel. The mines were recently raided by that most dastardly of pirates, Captain Lodumani, but in his rush to get away he tripped and dropped jewels everywhere.
String.Item_Costume:211000003_DESC:
Lodumani is seeing the sights and stealing some valuable jewels!
<Dialog_ItemBold>"I should've brought some bigger luggage for all these treasures!"</>

Rex is undercover as a factory security guard.

Dao takes another step on his journey to become the ultimate racer.

String.Item_Costume:225000003_DESC:
The colors of the hot sun and the lush forest are in Derek's uniform.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"There's nothing to fear if you become one with nature."</>
String.Item_Kart:401000124_DESC:
Clear the track of broken-down karts!
The race must go on.
String.Mail_Tool_Message24: We apologize for any inconvenience caused by a recent error. We've fixed the error and sent you some compensation to say sorry. Please see the announcement for details.
String.Item_Costume:209000002_DESC:
Diz is Boomhill's top scorer.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"My kick is faster than a kart!"</>
String.Item_Kart:401000162_DESC: The official kart of Boomhill. Now you can take your village with you wherever you go!
String.TrackDesc_Village_I04: This is an essential Boomhill track. The long, straight sections make it perfect for beginners, with five spots that are ideal for drifting.
String.TrackDesc_Village_I10: Bask in the laid-back atmosphere of Boomhill! You can watch the hot air balloons drift and the windmills turn as you leave the competition in the dust.
String.TrackDesc_Village_I02: A track shaped like a finger in Boomhill. It's a favorite spot for racers practicing their drifting. Bazzi was so taken with the interesting track shape that he accidentally spent all day practicing.
String.TrackDesc_Ice_R04: A track modeled after the stadium in Boomhill. You can hear the audience scream and cheer as you zip around the curves and corners.
String.TrackDesc_Village_R01: A notorious track in Boomhill where Dao and Bazzi had their infamous racing duel. Winning here depends how well you can drift and your knowledge of the course.
String.TrackDesc_Village_I09: The groves of Boomhill produce some of the finest lemons in the land! The road is in sorry shape due to some major plumbing catastrophes... in spite of Bazzi's best efforts to fix them up.
String.Item_Costume:218000001_DESC:
This sharp-witted technician believes the best way to test a kart is to race it. When he's not tinkering with karts, he's reading books.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Did I tell you about the last book I read? Hey, where are you going...?"</>
String.Item_Kart:401000219_DESC:
Taking good care of the morning in Boomhill.
Proudly making deliveries quickly and accurately.
String.Skill_P06_Desc_Long_Brian_1: Brian received the call and is ready to make a quick arrest! Brian starts the race with an Enhanced Siren, and when Brian obtains a Siren, it is exchanged with an Enhanced Siren with increased speed, along with a Barricade.
String.Item_Character:100000017_DESC:
This lively girl from Brazil is an excellent engineer. She's on a mission to redeem her friend, Kris.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"There's still good in Kris. I know there is!"</>
String.Item_Character:100000019_DESC:
Tobi was just another one of Brodi's androids until a freak malfunction gave him sentience and free will!
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Who are you calling a freak malfunction?!"</>
String.Skill_A02_Desc_Long_Brodi_1: Brodi just loves to give everyone a little boost! When this skill is activated, Brodi will make a temporary Boost Zone in the direction he is facing. Anyone who drives over it will have their speed increased for a short time.
String.Tutorial_Ingame_Mission5_Script40: Brodi will install a Boost Zone in the direction that <Scenario_Desc_Bold>{0}</> is facing.
String.Loading_Tip_common_90: Depending on what he wears that day, Brodi could be either a professor or an athlete.
String.License_outgame_licenseget_Tip2: Get Bronze rank and earn 2/3 of all stars.
String.ShopItem-BrutusPack_DetailDesc: Kart: Brutus, Accessory: Brutus License Plate
String.Item_Character:100000036_DESC:
The 2nd-in-charge at Black Company, he's much more cool-headed than his little brother, Raptor L. Too bad he always has a snotty nose.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Viktor, I've got a plan."</>
String.Item_Character:100000035_DESC:
He's an unstoppable man of action, but all he really wants is to be recognized by his older twin, Raptor R. Sadly, his rash nature gets in the way of that.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"I'll handle it this time, brother!"</>
String.Item_Costume:236000004_DESC:
Raptor R looks to expand Black Company's reach to the sea.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"I'll bring the entire ocean to Viktor if he asks for it."</>
String.ShopItem-Pack_BluePlasmaFT_detailDesc: Character: Blue Racer Dao, Kart: Plasma FT, Accessory: Plasma FT License Plate, Accessory: Plasma FT Booster
String.Item_Motion:358020005_DESC: Aww! My heart goes to you, BLINK!
String.Item_Motion:358010005_DESC: Aww! My heart goes to you, BLINK!
String.Item_Motion:356010005_DESC: My heart goes out to BLINK!
String.Item_Motion:356020005_DESC: My heart goes out to BLINK!
String.TrackDesc_Forest_R02: Zig and zag through this atmospheric forest. Animals frolic through the mist, seemingly transporting you to a different world. Test your skills on this track's tight turns!
String.BlockPopup_text2:
Use of this account has been restricted due to abnormal gameplay.
Please contact customer support.

String.Skill_A09_Desc_Long_Vivi_1: Vivi can be freezing cold when she wants to be! When this skill is activated, Vivi places snowballs all over the track. If any racer besides Vivi runs into them, they will slide and temporarily lose control of their kart.

<Dialog_ItemBold>"I'll never give up my life's quest! And that world domination thing, too!"</>

The villainous head of Black Company has set his sights on world domination! If only he could do something about his hair.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Mwahaha! ...Don't touch my hair!"</>

All Mobi wants is to sail the seas with the best pirates in the world.

The villainous Miso appeared from the future to bring misery and misfortune to our world.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Join my crew or you'll have nothing left to smile about!"</>

Marid has the world in her grasp.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Evil is number one."</>

Orion had no trouble slaying all the devils he could find.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"That performance should bring up my score!"</>

Lodumani swings the baton however he pleases, ignoring the sheet music entirely.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Play as I command!"</>

A black aura surrounds this evil kart.
It silently appears to commit crimes and then disappears back into the night.
String.Item_emoticon:801000053_DESC: "Goodbye, my kart. You made me happy..."

An android created by Brodi. It became sentient unlike the other androids due to an unknown error and cannot be controlled by the central system.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Tobi is not a defect! Hmph!"</>

Danger? No problem!

Bazzi came outside to exercise, but now he's feeling drowsy.

Rena is a role model to younger girls with her bold attitude.

Miso is new to the school and seems nice. Suspiciously nice.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Hello! My name is Miso and I'm going to be your bestest friend!"</>
String.Item_Costume:240000001_DESC:
This new star of the kart circuit dazzles the crowd on the track, but her private life is veiled in secrecy.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Here's the real question: Are we having fun yet?"</>

String.Item_Motion:320020005_DESC: Isn't it nice to be adored by your fans?

He may still be in diapers, but this baby was born to race! He's trying to save up prize money to buy a kart custom-built for his baby body.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Bwah bwah bwah bwaaah bwah bwah!"</>

String.Item_Motion:350020004_DESC: This is a great dream, hee hee!

String.Item_Motion:336010001_DESC: Next time, I'll crush them all!
String.Item_Motion:336020001_DESC: Next time, I'll crush them all!
String.Item_Motion:314010008_DESC: I think I played too many games yesterday...
String.Item_Costume:216000010_DESC:
Cute little Uni has been fashioned from nothing but the purest snow!
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Bwaa bwa bwaa! Bwa bwa bwaa! Bwa bwa bwa bwa bwaa!"</>
String.Tutorial_Outro_Disable1: You've done this before, haven't you? You're destined for stardom!
String.Tutorial_Lobby_Script30: Have fun out there, and good luck, <Scenario_Desc_Bold>{0}</>!
String.Item_Costume:225000001_DESC:
This legendary racer holds the world record for most wins. He oozes charisma, but he never lets the fame go to his head.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"It doesn't matter whether you win or lose. Only the race matters."</>

Imbued with the magic of the Ice Queen,
you'll send a chill down the track when you race with this kart!

String.Item_Costume:215000006_DESC:
The ever-popular Mos became class president after winning with a majority of the votes.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Believe me, I'm a politician you can trust!"</>
String.Consumption_UpgradeItem_use_D1: The Kart Upgrade Ticket will be used upon upgrading.
String.Consumption_UpgradeItem_use_D2: The Balloon Upgrade Ticket will be used upon upgrading.
String.KartUpgrade_Static40: Please select a kart to upgrade.
String.Consumption_UpgradeItem_caution_D1:
Upgrade Tickets increase the rank of the selected kart.
For example, a Fine Kart Upgrade Ticket will increase a Common Kart to Fine.
This item can only be used on karts with a rank lower than the one listed on the ticket.
String.Consumption_UpgradeItem_caution_D2:
Upgrade Tickets increase the rank of the selected balloon.
For example, a Fine Balloon Upgrade Ticket will increase a Common balloon to Fine.
This item can only be used on balloons with a rank lower than the one listed on the ticket.

String.TrackDesc_World_R11: It's easy to get immersed in the festive nighttime beach atmosphere of this track! The sunset, the light bulb-strung palm trees, and the neon signs will make you feel as if you are cruising through an iconic movie backdrop. Even though the roads are wide, you'll still need to navigate how you handle this course without putting a significant gap between you and anyone in the lead!
String.Item_Kart:401000109_DESC: This hippo loves the summer! Slip and slide down the track with glee.
String.Item_Character:100000030_DESC:
A passionate dancer, Rena likes to relax by lying in the shade and listening to music with a cold drink. Normally, she is proper and proud, but if you push her buttons she'll have no problem showing you who's in charge!
<Dialog_ItemBold>"I love the way the sun dances across the sky!"</>
String.Item_Costume:235000003_DESC:
Raptor L hides in plain sight as a devilish fox.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Wearing the perfect disguise is a fundamental part of being a ninja!"</>
String.Grandprix_HOF_Text4:
Welcome to the Hall of Fame, the stage for the best racers to ever grace the Ranked Queue.
Join us next season for a chance to be entered into the Hall of Fame!
String.ShopItem-PlagueDoctorPack_DetailDesc: Character: Plague Doctor Sophia, Kart: Darkness Guardian, Accessory: Darkness Guardian License Plate
String.ShopItem-PlagueDoctorPack_PromotionDesc: Drive away the plague. Fight darkness with darkness!

The Cotton got a special holiday makeover!
This kart brings joy and happiness wherever it goes!
String.TrackDesc_WKC_R08: There are so many gradual turns on this track, it's easy to fill up on Boosts! Just drift along these curves as much as you can and boost yourself to victory! Be sure to keep an eye out for a hidden shortcut somewhere within the beautiful scenery that is sure to wow the crowd.

Surprising no one, Rave won yet another celebrity racing tournament.

Dao believes in two things: good sportsmanship and never giving up.

This genius hacker is in it for the kicks. Kris may have joined forces with some questionable characters, but she really just wants to have some fun.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Are we having fun yet?"</>

String.Item_Costume:207000001_DESC:
With her twin brother Pim, Vivi is a guardian sprite of Snow Tree Town. She's working with Brodi to pursue her true passionkart design!
<Dialog_ItemBold>"My kart will keep Snow Tree Town safe and sound!"</>
String.TrackDesc_Random_R02: Randomly selects a track meant for Speed Mode.
String.Item_Kart:401000245_DESC:
Perfectly tuned for massive acceleration.
On the track, this kart drives like nothing can stop it!
String.Replay_Select_Desc:
The thrills of yesterday!
Relive the excitement of past races.
String.Ontimeevent_main_static2: Rewards are given out to racers that log in during the On-Time event.
String.Item_Kart:401000210_DESC: A must-have for all tourists. Keeps every trip fun, comfortable and well-prepared!
String.Item_Costume:240000006_DESC:
Unsurprisingly, Rave was chosen to be this summer's resident fashionista.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Like I've always said, a true star is popular no matter the season."</>
String.endyearEvent_Desc1: Thank you for all your support for KartRider: Drift this year.

Neo stays devoted to making the world a better place, even if that means taking things into his own hands.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"No matter the cost, justice always prevails."</>
String.PlayMission_Guide_Script_2:
Oh, wow!
You've become quite the racer since I saw you last!
String.Item_Motion:355020010_DESC: This is how you do it!
String.Item_Kart:401000077_DESC:
Perfect tuning and flexibility.
What more could you ask for?
String.Item_Costume:257000002_DESC:
LISA knows practice makes perfect on stage and during a race.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"You can't be careless when you're the best, haha!"</>
String.Item_Kart:401000225_DESC: A lonely spirit is one with this kart, ceaselessly roaming racetracks looking for what it lost.
String.Item_Motion:335020010_DESC: Everyone knows I've got better moves than my brother...
String.ShopItem-Pack_BT21_School_RJ_detailDesc: Character: Cooking Student RJ, Emote: Showboat (RJ/Seated), Emote: Bored (RJ/Seated), Emote: Showboat (RJ), Emote: Bored (RJ)

Brian went undercover as a yacht captain after a tip told him about a crime on the waters.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Land, air or sea: I will arrest all criminals!"</>
String.TrackDesc_Mine_I02: It's unclear what they were mining here, but now these mines are filled with magma. Make one mistake and your goose is cooked!
String.Loading_Tip_common_62: If any of your teammates are attacked by a <image id="spaceship"/>, you can save them with an <image id="magnetspaceshipdefence"/>!
String.Match_tutorial_Script_4: Since we're going into Item Mode, let's adjust the settings available for <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>matching</>.
String.Loading_Tip_Flag_6: Take your Flag to your team's zone to earn double points.
String.Tutorial_Ingame_Mission3_Cut1_Script30: Why don't you try getting an item?
String.Item_Character:100000047_DESC:
CHIMMY of BT21 is passionate about being the best racer there is! CHIMMY has mastered unfamiliar tracks and speeds past in a yellow hoodie.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Winning a race is almost as fun as playing the harmonica!"</>
String.Item_Character:100000048_DESC:
COOKY of BT21 wants glory, fame, and...the prize money, too! COOKY's drive for victory is bested only by their heart...and their cute looks!
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Hey, this racing thing is pretty fun!"</>
String.Item_Character:100000050_DESC:
KOYA of BT21 is skipping naptime to go for the winner's podium. Don't worry; they have a pillow handy for a post-victory snooze!
<Dialog_ItemBold>"I'm not sleeping, I'm just resting my eyes...on the trophy!"</>
String.Item_Character:100000046_DESC:
MANG of BT21 has some moves he'd like to use across the finish line! Although the mask blocks the view, MANG races using rhythms learned from dancing.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"It's no secret...I've got better moves than anyone on the track."</>
String.Item_Character:100000051_DESC:
RJ of BT21 loves a tasty snack, but winning's good, too! RJ only has eyes for the finish line...and for taking care of their friends.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Winning is great, but be sure to stay safe out there!"</>
String.Item_Character:100000049_DESC:
SHOOKY of BT21 is after the trophy for first place...and top prankster! They zip past the competition with their outsized courage.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Don't underestimate me unless you want to find yourself in last place!"</>
String.Item_Character:100000045_DESC:
TATA of BT21 wants the prize after stretching into first place! Delivering peace and love throughout Earth in a single lap is TATA's wish.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Love isn't supernatural, it just takes a little effort!"</>
String.Grandprix_Setting_S1_Item_Desc:
Rocket and bubble your way to victory!
Join the Item Grand Prix and become this season's best racer!
String.RankMatch_20241st_Item_Desc:
Blast, bubble, and burst your way to victory!
Use all you've got in the Item Ranked Queue and become the first champion of 2024!
String.Grandprix_Setting_Item_Desc:

String.TrackDesc_World_I07: The aesthetics of the city where East meets West are unlike anywhere else in the world. The streets bustle with tourists taking in the historic cisterns, the colorful residences, and the grand mosque.

String.TrackDesc_World_R12: This perilous tracks features narrow roads and tight turns. One slip-up, and you could fall between the Dao and Bazzi terracotta warriors. Precise driving wins the day on this course!

String.Option_rookie6_Static48:
Turns on Driving Assistance features that provide gameplay guidance.

- Track Guidelines
- Driving Direction
- Boost Hint
- Instant Boost Hint
- Display Zones
- Landing Spot
String.Option_rookie6_Static50:
Turns on Driving Correction features that make your mistakes less punishing.

This prevents shortcuts from being used.

While enabled, a Driving Assistance Balloon will be attached to your kart. Can only be used with an L3 license or lower.

- Drift Correction
- Edge Guardrails
- Corner Guardrails
- Reduced Collision Force
String.Option_rookie6_Static49:
Turns on Driving Assistance features that automate game actions.

While enabled, a Driving Assistance Balloon will be attached to your kart. Can only be used with an L3 license or lower.

- Auto-Accelerate (Not Available on PC)
- Auto-Instant Boost (Item Mode)
- Auto-Instant Boost (Speed Mode)
- Quick Automatic Return
String.Option_rookie6_Static2:
Enable various features to help guide your driving. A Driving Assistance Balloon will be attached to your kart depending on what stage you have this set to.

Max: Available for B2 racers. Gives strong driving assistance. This is ideal for learning drivers!

Medium: Available for B1 racers or lower. Gives mild driving assistance.

Min: Available for L3 racers or lower. Gives notifications, but no direct driving assistance.

Custom: Enable each feature individually.

String.Skill_P14_Desc_Long_Keffy_1:
Keffy gets so excited after obtaining an Item Box that he has a chance to throw out one of two donuts. They can be consumed by any racer. Eating a donut will grant different effects depending on the flavor:
Blueberry Donut: Decreases Acceleration for a certain amount of time.
Mint-Chocolate Donut: Knocks the racer up into the air.
String.TrackDesc_Tomb_I04: The structures along the track are well lit, but still give off a spooky aura. Keffy once raced here (a donut was on the line), and he mistook a bat for a ghost. His foot hit the gas and he zipped from last to firstand that is how Keffy set the record on this track.

String.Item_Motion:335010008_DESC: Hmm... I wonder what my brother is up to...
String.Item_Costume:235000004_DESC:
Raptor L sailed to the southern seas to help conquer it.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Lodumani's pirate crew? They're nothing compared to my brother!"</>
String.Item_Costume:235000001_DESC:
He's an unstoppable man of action, but all he really wants is to be recognized by his older twin, Raptor R. Sadly, his rash nature gets in the way of that.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"I'll handle it this time, brother!"</>
String.Item_Character:100000040_DESC:
This new star of the kart circuit dazzles the crowd on the track, but her private life is veiled in secrecy.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Here's the real question: Are we having fun yet?"</>
String.ShopItem-Pack_BT21_Picnic_TATA_detailDes: Character: Curious Camper TATA, Emote: Surprised (TATA), Emote: Affectionate (TATA)
String.Item_Costume:245000003_DESC:
One of TATA's favorite hobbies is observing earthlings at the campgrounds.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"It appears they travel all this way just to sleep on the bare ground! How fascinating!"</>
String.Item_Costume:227000002_DESC:
Wearing a pumpkin on her head, Spirit Kid makes a delightful jack-o'-lantern!
<Dialog_ItemBold>"This is so fun! I can be anything I want!"</>
String.Item_Costume:219000005_DESC:
Tobi masterfully disguises himself as his favorite gourd.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Hard to tell where the pumpkin ends and the Tobi begins, eh?"</>
String.Item_Motion:336020010_DESC: My brother wishes he could move like this!
String.Skill_A12_Desc_Long_Sophia_1: Sophia just wants to be alone and has no problem hacking her way there! When this skill is activated, Sophia disrupts a nearby opponent to disable any Shields, Angel Armor or Boost effects.
String.Item_Costume:203000009_DESC:
Brodi knows the streets of New York like the back of his hand.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Trust me, you do NOT want to be on Fifth this time of day. Buckle up!"</>
String.Shop_popup5_Static2: Reset your secondary password on the website and try again.
String.Item_Costume:203000007_DESC:
No one looks as stylish as Brodi does in his flamingo sunglasses.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"I'm so cool I need an extra month of summer!"</>
String.Item_Motion:335010001_DESC: That's it! Now I'm fed up!
String.Item_Motion:335020001_DESC: That's it! Now I'm fed up!

String.Skill_A14_Desc_Long_Pim_1: Pim can be ice cold when he wants to be! When this skill is activated, Pim places a snowflake on the track. If any racer besides Pim drives over it, they will be temporarily unable to steer.

String.TrackDesc_World_I10: This track is less like a race and more like a vacation destination! The pastel-colored motif and laid back residents are great at keeping summer cool! We recommend that racers looking for fun take a jump from the turtle platform in front of the hotel at least once!
String.TrackDesc_WKC_R07: This eye-catching track from Japan is bursting with cherry blossoms in all their glory. The bright petals that dance on the wind combined with the stunning backdrop will make you believe you are racing through your very own anime.
